sqlMap.select: SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.getCateList */ hi.CATE_CODE ,B.CATE_NAME ,hi.UPPER_CATE_CODE ,LEVEL ,hi.CATE_LEVEL ,CATE_ORDER ,CASE WHEN CATE_LEVEL = 1 THEN CATE_ORDER * 10000 WHEN CATE_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT CATE_ORDER * 10000 FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATE_CODE = hi.UPPER_CATE_CODE) + CATE_ORDER * 100 WHEN CATE_LEVEL = 3 THEN (SELECT CATE_ORDER * 10000 FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATE_CODE = (SELECT UPPER_CATE_CODE FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATE_CODE = hi.UPPER_CATE_CODE)) + UPPER_CATE_ORDER * 100 + CATE_ORDER ELSE CATE_ORDER END AS LEVEL_ORDER FROM ( SELECT hierarchy_connect_by_parent_eq_prior_id_cate(CATE_CODE) AS CATE_CODE, @level AS level FROM ( SELECT @start_with := (SELECT UPPER_CATE_CODE FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATE_LEVEL = 0 ), @id := @start_with, @level := 0 ) vars ,TB_CATEGORY WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) ho ,(SELECT A.* ,IFNULL(B.CATE_ORDER, 0) AS UPPER_CATE_ORDER FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY B ON B.CATE_CODE = A.UPPER_CATE_CODE ) hi ,TB_CATEGORY_NM B WHERE hi.CATE_CODE = ho.CATE_CODE AND hi.CATE_CODE = B.CATE_CODE AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# ORDER BY LEVEL_ORDER

SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.selectMenu */ A.MENU_TYPE , A.MENU_CODE , A.UPPER_MENU_CODE , B.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_LEVEL , IFNULL(A.LINK_URL, '') AS LINK_URL , IFNULL(A.LINK_PARAM, '') AS LINK_PARAM , A.MENU_ORDER , A.USE_YN , IF((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_MENU C WHERE C.MENU_TYPE = A.MENU_TYPE AND C.MENU_CODE LIKE CONCAT(A.MENU_CODE, '%')) = 1, 'Y', 'N') AS ISLEAF_YN FROM TB_MENU A ,TB_MENU_NM B WHERE A.MENU_TYPE = B.MENU_TYPE AND A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE AND A.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE# AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD#

SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.selectMenuUserGroup*/ A.USER_TYPE ,C.CODE_NM USER_TYPE_NAME ,A.USER_ROLE ,D.USER_ROLE_NM FROM TB_MENU_USERGROUP A ,TB_CODE B ,TB_CODE_NM C ,TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER D WHERE A.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE# AND A.USER_TYPE = B.CODE_ID AND B.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'USER_TYPE' AND B.CODE_GROUP_ID = C.CODE_GROUP_ID AND B.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID AND C.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# AND A.USER_TYPE = D.USER_TYPE AND A.USER_ROLE = D.USER_ROLE ORDER BY A.USER_TYPE, D.USER_ROLE_NM
SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.selectMenuOrderMax */ IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ORDER), 1) AS MAX_MENU_ORDER FROM TB_MENU WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_MENU /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.updateMenu */ SET LINK_URL = #LINK_URL# ,LINK_PARAM = #LINK_PARAM# ,MENU_ORDER = #MENU_ORDER# ,USE_YN = #USE_YN# ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d') WHERE MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE#

INSERT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.updateMenuNm */ INTO TB_MENU_NM ( MENU_TYPE, MENU_CODE, LANG_CD, MENU_NAME, INSERT_USER_ID, INSERT_DT) VALUES ( #MENU_TYPE#, #MENU_CODE#, #LANG_CD#, #MENU_NAME#, #LOGIN_ID#, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MENU_NAME = #MENU_NAME#, UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#, UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' )

UPDATE TB_MENU /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.updateMenuOrderDown */ SET MENU_ORDER = MENU_ORDER - 1 ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE# AND MENU_ORDER > #OLD_MENU_ORDER# AND MENU_ORDER <= #MENU_ORDER#

UPDATE TB_MENU /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.updateMenuOrderUp */ SET MENU_ORDER = MENU_ORDER + 1 ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE# AND MENU_ORDER < #OLD_MENU_ORDER# AND MENU_ORDER >= #MENU_ORDER#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MENU /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.insertMenu */ (MENU_TYPE ,MENU_CODE ,UPPER_MENU_CODE ,MENU_LEVEL ,LINK_URL ,LINK_PARAM ,MENU_ORDER ,USE_YN ,INSERT_USER_ID ,INSERT_DT ,UPDATE_USER_ID ,UPDATE_DT) VALUES( #MENU_TYPE# ,#MENU_CODE# ,#UPPER_MENU_CODE# ,#MENU_LEVEL# ,#LINK_URL# ,#LINK_PARAM# ,#MENU_ORDER# ,#USE_YN# ,#LOGIN_ID# ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,#LOGIN_ID# ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )

INSERT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.insertMenuUserGroup */ INTO TB_MENU_USERGROUP ( MENU_TYPE ,MENU_CODE ,USER_TYPE ,USER_ROLE ,INSERT_USER_ID ,INSERT_DT ) SELECT #MENU_TYPE# ,#MENU_CODE# ,USER_TYPE ,USER_ROLE ,#LOGIN_ID# ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER WHERE USER_TYPE = 'M'
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.selectInsertedMenu */ CONCAT(#UPPER_MENU_CODE#, IF(IFNULL(MAX(MENU_CODE), '9999') = '9999', '001', LPAD(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(MAX(MENU_CODE), LENGTH(UPPER_MENU_CODE)+1, 3), UNSIGNED) + 1, 3, '0'))) AS MENU_CODE ,(SELECT MENU_LEVEL + 1 FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE#) AS MENU_LEVEL ,IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ORDER), 0) + 1 AS MENU_ORDER FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE# AND MENU_CODE != '1999' /*template 메뉴제외 */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.deleteMenuGroup */ FROM TB_MENU_USERGROUP WHERE MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE#

sqlMap.select: SELECT /* CateTree_Mysql.xml cateTree.selectMenuUserGrp */ A.USER_TYPE ,CD.CODE_NM AS USER_TYPE_NM ,A.USER_ROLE ,A.USER_ROLE_NM ,IF(A.MENU_CODE IS NULL, 'N', 'Y') AS USE_YN FROM ( SELECT A.USER_TYPE ,A.USER_ROLE ,A.USER_ROLE_NM ,B.MENU_TYPE ,B.MENU_CODE FROM TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER A LEFT JOIN TB_MENU_USERGROUP B ON A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE AND A.USER_ROLE = B.USER_ROLE AND B.MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE# ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENU B ON A.MENU_TYPE = B.MENU_TYPE AND A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE ,TB_CODE_NM CD WHERE A.USER_TYPE = CD.CODE_ID AND CD.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'USER_TYPE' AND CD.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# ORDER BY A.USER_TYPE, A.USER_ROLE
